alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Hubbard; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 05 at 4:34AM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Light snow and freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northwest Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Hubbard; Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
